info.name: IOBWS 3.0 Cards
info.description:
IOBWS 3.0 Cards

Contact Support:
 Name: Stadlarad Islands
 Email: openbanking@stadlar.is

item.name: Read transaction list of a card.

header.description: ID of the request, unique to the call, as determined by the initiating party.
(Required) Azure API management subscription key

query.description: (Required) Permitted codes are   * \"information\",   * \"booked\",   * \"pending\", and   * \"both\" \"booked\" shall be supported by the Bank. To support the \"pending\" and \"both\" feature is optional for the Bank, Error code if not supported in the online banking frontend

Conditional: Starting date (inclusive the date dateFrom) of the expected list, mandated if no delta access is required and if bookingStatus does not equal \"information.  The relevant date is usually the booking date of the instrument e.g. financial transaction or currency rate value date.

End date (inclusive the data dateTo) of the expected list, default is \"now\" if not given.  Might be ignored if a delta function is used.  The relevant date is usually the booking date of the instrument e.g. financial transaction or currency rate value date.

variable.description: (Required) This identification is denoting the addressed card. The card-id is retrieved by using a \"Read Card List\" call. The card-id is the \"resourceId\" attribute of the card structure. Its value is constant at least throughout the lifecycle of a given consent.

request.description: Reads transaction list or transaction report from a given card addressed by \"card-id\".

header.description: ID of the request, unique to the call, as determined by the initiating party.

header.description: ID of the request, unique to the call, as determined by the initiating party.
(Required) Azure API management subscription key

variable.description: (Required) This identification is denoting the addressed card. The card-id is retrieved by using a \"Read Card List\" call. The card-id is the \"resourceId\" attribute of the card structure. Its value is constant at least throughout the lifecycle of a given consent.

request.description: Reads details about a card. It is assumed that a consent of the user to this access is already given and stored on the Bank's system.  The addressed details of this account depends then on the stored consent addressed by consentId, respectively the OAuth2 access token.  Please note, that the current line of credit of a given card might be tighter than what the balance response will suggest, due to credit limits on the card account and transactions by other cards to the same account.

(Required) Azure API management subscription key

request.description: Reads a list of cards potentially with additional information, e.g. balance information.  It is assumed that a consent of the user to this access is already given and stored on the Bank's system. The addressed list of cards depends then on the stored consent addressed by consentId, respectively the OAuth2 access token.  Please note, that the current line of credit of a given card might be tighter than what the balance response will suggest, due to credit limits on the card account and transactions by other cards to the same account.
